price: Yeroma mallattoowwan keenya ifa taatee isaanitti dhuftu “kun Sihrii (falfala) ifa bahaadha” jedhan.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡهُمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا مُبۡصِرَةٗ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāathum āyātunā mub'ṣiratan qālū hādhā siḥ'run mubīnun
